member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.Grayscale
member.summary: Whether or not you would like the images grayscaled.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.Negative
member.summary: Whether or not you would like a negative of the images.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.Sepia
member.summary: Whether or not you would like to turn your images into sepia.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.MaintainPalette
member.summary: Whether or not you would like to maintain the original palette. This keeps the original colorpalette which is great for resizing GIF and PNG.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.Clip
member.summary: Whether or not you would like the images to be clipped to size.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.Quantize
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not you would like to quantize your GIF images. It greatly enhances the quality at the cost of processingtime.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.Brightness
member.summary: Adjust the brightness of your images. Choose a value between -1 and 1 where 0 is default.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.Contrast
member.summary: Adjust the contrast of your image. Choose a value between 0 and 3 where 1 is default.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.Opacity
member.summary: Adjust the opacity of your image. Choose a value between 0 and 1 where 0 is default.

member.summary: Gets the server cache timeout in minutes.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.BetterImageConfigurationSection.ClientCacheTimeout
member.summary: Gets the client cache timeout in minutes.

member.summary: Gets the fontsize for the copyright text.
member.value: The fontsize for the copyright text.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not you would like the src of the image to be encrypted. It helps in preventing download of the original image.
member.value: true if you want to encrypt the source; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not you would like to disable right mouse button. Works only if JavaScript is enabled.
member.value: true if you would like to disable right click; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not you would like to protect your images from leechers / deeplinkers.

summary.para: The maximum width of the image.
The maximum height of the image.
The resize quality of the image.
The output quality of the image.
Whether or not you would like the image grayscaled.
Whether or not you would like a negative of the image.
Whether or not you would like to turn your image into sepia.
Whether or not you would like to maintain the original palette.
summary.remarks: This keeps the original colorpalette which is great for resizing GIF and PNG.

summary.para: Whether or not you would like the image to be clipped to size.
Whether or not you would like to quantize your GIF images.
summary.remarks: It greatly enhances the quality at the cost of processingtime.

summary.para: Adjust the brightness of your image.
summary.remarks: Choose a value between -1 and 1 where 0 is default.

summary.para: Adjust the contrast of your image.
summary.remarks: Choose a value between 0 and 3 where 1 is default.

summary.para: Adjust the opacity of your image.
summary.remarks: Choose a value between 0 and 1 where 0 is default.

summary.para: Whether or not you would like the output cached. Can be very powerfull but be shure to know what you're doing. Don't cache 300 large images.
Use the ImageCacheController property to define the cache controller that's being used.

member.name: P:Wmb.Web.ImageSettings.ClientCacheTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the client cache timeout in minutes.

summary.para: Gets or sets the preset name in the Save dialog on 'Save image as'.
Gets or sets the copyright text.
The fontsize for the copyright text.
Whether or not you would like the src of the image to be encrypted. It helps in preventing download of the original image.
Whether or not you would like to disable right mouse button. Works only if JavaScript is enabled.
Whether or not you would like to protect your images from leechers / deeplinkers.
Gets or sets the custom image transform to apply.
